reviewText: Great Item Great Service Thank You

I had read plenty of reviews of the "AJ Reveals the Truth About Golf" video that were about one-half favorable and the other half not so favorable.  Well, I found a good price on-line for the video so I bought it.  I'm really glad I did.  The information in the video made be realize that for many years I haven't had the proper release of my hands in my golf swing.  Overall, I am now hitting the ball more solidly and for a little more distance.  I posted a positive review for the video on AJ's website, and I thought it was really nice that he personally responded to me via e-mail with his thanks and encouragement.  I will say that this is not your typical golf instruction video that presents a series of many golf tips.  It pretty much explains a way of increasing clubhead speed and improving ballstriking and distance with a technique that improves one's release in the golf swing.  Again, it has helped me and I'm glad I got it.

the info on this DVD really made me understand the mechanics of the driver and the fine points of golf ball impact..AJ really simplifed it and unlocked the mystery! I am immensely happy and pleased with this DVD
